content.text:
# Hunnic War

Hunnic War  may refer to:
*Gupta–Hunnic Wars, between the Gupta Empire and Hunas (including the Kidarites, Hephthalites and Alchon Huns) in the 5th to 6th-centuries
**First Hunnic War (496–515), between the Gupta Empire, including the Aulikaras, and Toramana of the Alchon Huns
***Aulikara-Hunnic War of 515, which ended the First Hunnic War
**Second Hunnic War (), between Indian confederacies in the Gupta Empire and Mihirakula of the Alchon Huns
***Battle of Sondani (528), which ended the Second Hunnic War
***Pala invasion of Hunas, in which Devapala conquered the principality of Hunas
See also
*Hunnic (disambiguation)
*Huna (disambiguation)
